summary: This mod adds a book to leveled lists, that once obtained, enables the player to see the location of mines around the province of Skyrim.
descriptionHtml:
=====================
+++CURRENT VERSION+++
=====================

V1.1 - October 11th 2012

=================
+++Description+++
=================

This mod adds a book to leveled lists, that once obtained, enables the player to see the location of mines around the province of Skyrim. This makes it easier to locate them. The book features hints about the content of these mines as well.
If you\'re tired of looking for the book, bring up the console, and type this in: help \"mines of\"
Just copy the ID of the book after the additem command like so \"player.additem #\"

Please note! Some locations appear to be other location types on the map, but these places contain or are very close to the entrance of an actual mine.

I\'d really love some feedback, so please tell me if you have a hard time finding the book. I\'ll make it spawn more often. Also if there is someone willing to help me, I\'d also like to feature some of the more significant or rare ore veins that appear in the wilderness without a map marker. If you know a way to do this, just drop me a note!

================
+++DOWNLOAD+++
================

Nexus - http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/25289/
Steam - http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=101888089

==================
+++Requirements+++
==================

-Skyrim 1.7.7.0.6 or Later

==================
+++Installation+++
==================

Manual: Extract archive to Skyrim/Data folder. Click yes to Overwrite old files.
Automatic: Install with Nexus Mod Manager.

=======================
+++Upcoming Features+++
=======================

Next: \"Walls of Skyrim\" for locating shouts! (Separate mod)


===================
+++Compatibility+++
===================

-Some leveled lists are changed.

================
+++Known Bugs+++
================

-I\'m expecting some heavy testing until I can say. I have found none yet.
Please point out any grammar, or spelling issues!

================
+++Change Log+++
================

V1.1 - Added some more information to the book, and lowered the spawn frequency of the book.
V1.0 - Initial Release - October 11th 2012.

=============
+++Credits+++
=============

JustinOther
Every Endorser this mod attracts!
Bethesda for Skyrim and the CK,
And several quick commenters for my help pleas regarding Papyrus.
UESP Wiki.

Thanks to you all!
author: iPalantir
